title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VIII, pt. 360 - Public Access To Records Of The Department Of Agriculture And Markets Of The State Of New York
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VIII, pt. 360

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §87;Agriculture and

Markets Law, §§16, 18, 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
